title: Create Navigation Bar Component with Routing

objective.i_want: to navigate between different pages using a consistent navigation bar
objective.so_that: I can easily access dashboard, calculator, and profile sections

acceptance_criteria.description: NavBar displays links to Home, Dashboard, Calculator, and Profile pages
NavBar highlights the currently active page
NavBar is responsive with hamburger menu on mobile
NavBar includes the Footprint logo and brand name
NavBar uses React Router for client-side navigation

stop_conditions: Never hardcode URLs that should be environment-based
Never commit directly to main branch
Stop if constitutional AI score drops below 0.9
Stop if accessibility requirements are not met
